attributes.action: Support Hong Kong Democracy and Prevent A Second Tiananmen Massacre in Hong Kong
attributes.additional_details:
We, the democracy-loving people urge you to press the Chinese Government to honor its promise of democratic elections to the Hong Kong citizenry.

Beijing’s recent decision ruled out a democratic election of the HK Chief Executive, which has made large-scale peaceful protests in Hong Kong inevitable. Given Beijing's records, we fear a second Tiananmen Massacre will happen in Hong Kong. We believe that the UK has the responsibility to prevent such tragedies from happening. We hereby strongly appeal to the UK government to make it clear to the Beijing authorities that any effort to crackdown peaceful demonstrations by force will be strongly opposed and severely punished.
